bug.description: Hi, In the notebook, the parser to load the Potsdam data must be modified : Original : all_ids = ["".join(f.split('')[3:5]) for f in all_files] What works : all_ids = ["".join(f.split('')[5:7]) for f in all_files] And there is a typo in DATA_FOLDER for Potsdam : it begins with a "3" not with a "Y".
